title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Bun, Deno and browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat backend.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent API, streaming, embeddings, list/pull models.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing async/sync wrappers over Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app that talks to a local Ollama server.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local LLM completions via Ollama.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI for Ollama with history, syntax highlighting, and themes.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & autoscaling options.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & GPU) for Ollama server.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Template repo showing RAG with Ollama, ChromaDB and LangChain.

title: ollama-spring-boot-starter
summary: Spring Boot auto-configuration to inject Ollama clients as beans.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module providing injectable Ollama service with async options.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community Go client for Ollama with generate, chat, embed, pull APIs.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app integrating Ollama for chat completions and embeddings.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that answers questions using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-mcp
summary: Model Context Protocol server exposing Ollama functions to MCP clients.

title: awesome-ollama
summary: Curated list of tools, libraries, tutorials and integrations for Ollama.
